title: Transportation: Bus (Usefulness 10)
description: Traveler usefulness 10/10 phrases for the Bus subcategory within Transportation. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.romaji: Basu tei wa doko desu ka?

cards.english: Does this bus go to Narita?
cards.romaji: Kono basu wa Narita ni ikimasu ka.
cards.japanese: このバスは成田に行きますか。
